cpl.readme:
A plugin to make ~TiddlyWiki read-only.
You can hide - by clicking one button - a set of <> and save this situation. Click the Publish button <> next to the sidebar button <>/<> to start making your TW 'publish-ready'. A new window with four tabs opens. <<< ''Note:''
@@.RED Although you can hide the 'Sidebar' and 'Advanced Search' button, they remain 'active'!@@ <<< There are a few ways to return from readonly to edit mode, see [[Help|$:/plugins/tg/sro/help]].
